testCases.name: Basic Question Answering
testCases.input: What is artificial intelligence? Provide a brief explanation.

testCases.name: Text Summarization
testCases.input: Artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the way we work and live. Machine learning algorithms can now process vast amounts of data to identify patterns and make predictions. Natural language processing enables computers to understand and generate human language. Computer vision allows machines to interpret visual information. These technologies are being applied across industries from healthcare to finance to transportation.
testCases.expectedOutput: Should be a concise summary (1-2 sentences)

testCases.name: Information Extraction
testCases.input: Meeting Details: Date: March 15, 2024, Time: 2:00 PM, Location: Conference Room A, Attendees: John Smith, Jane Doe, Bob Johnson, Topic: Q1 Product Launch Planning

testCases.name: Translation
testCases.input: Bonjour, comment allez-vous? Je m'appelle Marie.
testCases.expectedOutput: Hello, how are you? My name is Marie.

testCases.name: Data Analysis
testCases.input: Sales Report Q1 2024: January: $50,000, February: $65,000, March: $80,000, Total: $195,000. Analyze the trend.
testCases.expectedOutput: Should identify upward trend and provide analysis
